shadowverse:FriendOfTruth.NAME: Honest Cohort
shadowverse:FriendOfTruth.FLAVOR: Expose yourself to the deepest truths—the qualities, faculties, and reality of this plane.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, Spellboost all cards in your hand and draw pile #b1 time(s). Put 1 #yShivs into your hand.

shadowverse:Eleanor.NAME: Eleanor, Cosmic Friend
shadowverse:Eleanor.FLAVOR: I am Eleanor Gloria, Cosmic Flower and friend to you. For the two of us I shall proudly bloom!
DESCRIPTIONS: For the first #b3 turns, randomly add #b1 0 cost #yPetrification , #yConjure #yTwosome or #yStaff #yof #yWhirlwinds to your hand. Those cards Exhaust.

shadowverse:EnchantedLibrary.NAME: Enchanted Library
shadowverse:EnchantedLibrary.FLAVOR: Quiet, please. Noise upsets the books. -A poster in the Enchanted Library
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your first #b2 turns, put #b1 #ySkill card from your Draw Pile to your hand

shadowverse:EarthEssenceRelic.NAME: Earth Essence Amulet
shadowverse:EarthEssenceRelic.FLAVOR: I daresay the fruits of my research should take my magical abilities to still greater heights!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yEarth #yEssence.

shadowverse:Mysteria.NAME: Mysteria, Magic Founder
shadowverse:Mysteria.FLAVOR: It's always around us, and always with you.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add #b1 #yMysteria, #yMagic #yFounder into your draw pile and gain #b
Strength.

shadowverse:Genius.NAME: 'Genius Among Geniuses' Flair
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the 8th turn, deal #b61 damage to all enemies.

shadowverse:MissLethal.NAME: Missed Lethal
shadowverse:MissLethal.FLAVOR: ... Anyway, let's clear the board first.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 [E] at the start of your turn. Once per combat, if an non-Minion enemy's HP is at or below 20% at the end of your turn, that enemy gains #yIntangible.

shadowverse:Offensive.NAME: Token of 1st
shadowverse:Offensive.FLAVOR: I go first, no need to redraw.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] when you play the first #ySkill card each combat.

shadowverse:NeutralBook.NAME: Neutral Book
shadowverse:NeutralBook.FLAVOR: The story of a nightmare in Wonderland.
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemies drop an additional Colorless Shadowverse card reward. Activates 3 times per Act.

shadowverse:BlackPinya.NAME: The Black Pinya
DESCRIPTIONS: You feel more talkative.
@Pinyapipi!@

shadowverse:GoldPinya.NAME: The Golden Pinya
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, randomly put 1 #yDutiful #ySteed, #yBullet #yBike, or #yArcane #yPersonnel #yCarrier into your hand.

shadowverse:KMR1.NAME: Balance Changes: Defense Buff
shadowverse:KMR1.FLAVOR: To achieve better game balance, we're making changes to the enemies.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, all enemies gain #b8 Block.

shadowverse:KMR2.NAME: Balance Changes: Attack Buff
shadowverse:KMR2.FLAVOR: To achieve better game balance, we're making changes to the enemies.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, all enemies gain #b1 Strength.

shadowverse:Offensive2.NAME: Token of 1st
shadowverse:Offensive2.FLAVOR: I go first, no need to redraw.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play #b5 cards in one turn, deal #b2 damage to all enemies.

shadowverse:SixMark.NAME: Bow of Unkilling
shadowverse:SixMark.FLAVOR: Fear not ruin, one must merely endure eternity.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, randomly apply 1 Vulnerable, Weak, #yChoke , -1 #yStrength this turn, #yTalk #yto #ythe #yHand, or Poison to all enemies. Each of these debuffs apply only once.

shadowverse:ArisaBOSS.NAME: Quintitanias, Aether Bow
shadowverse:ArisaBOSS.FLAVOR: Come forth as verdant wind... Be my wings as I invoke thy name! Fly true!
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st. NL Gain [E] whenever you play the #b6th card in a turn.

shadowverse:NiouKyuu.NAME: Two-Crown Bow
shadowverse:NiouKyuu.FLAVOR: The dignified jewels embedded in this bow gaze into eternity, identifying possible threats to peace. One arrow loosed from its string can put an end to those threats.
DESCRIPTIONS: ALL enemies start combat with #b1 #yPinpoint #yPrey.

shadowverse:LymagaWeapon.NAME: Judgment Rising
shadowverse:LymagaWeapon.FLAVOR: You must understand that freedom is but a sweet poison.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, put a 0 cost #yGreenwood #yGuardian into your hand.

shadowverse:GlassOfIC.NAME: Iceschillendrig's Glasses
shadowverse:GlassOfIC.FLAVOR: I'll lay Reclamation upon your vessel.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HP, deal an equal amount of damage to ALL enemies.

shadowverse:KyoukaBOSS.NAME: Cosmo Blue Rod
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st. Whenever you play 6 #ySkill cards, the next #ySkill card will be played twice.

shadowverse:Mimori.NAME: 'Not-So-Ordinary' Flair
shadowverse:Mimori.FLAVOR: Nice to meet you! I'm Mimori Amamiya!
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage dealt + #b10%, damage taken - #b10%. By the end of your turn, if you have played at least 5 cards, increase your damage and reduction by #b10% (Up to 5 times). If you take any unblocked damage, reduce your damage and reduction by - #b10%.

shadowverse:KuonWeapon.NAME: Mitsura Ryakketsu
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add 1 #yShikigami #ySummons to your hand.

shadowverse:Offensive3.NAME: Token of 1st
shadowverse:Offensive3.FLAVOR: I go first, no need to redraw.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, perform #yNecromancy 3: Put 1 #yZombie into your hand.

shadowverse:BurialGround.NAME: Burial Grounds
shadowverse:BurialGround.FLAVOR: Death gathers, and it knows no bounds.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b1 #yShadows.

shadowverse:LunaBOSS.NAME: Luna's Friend
shadowverse:LunaBOSS.FLAVOR: Would you like to be Luna's friend?
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st. At the start of your turn, perform #yNecromancy 4: Add 1 #yLich to your hand.

shadowverse:Todoroki.NAME: Thunderous Roar
shadowverse:Todoroki.FLAVOR: Language breeds both good and evil. Only silence creates equality.
DESCRIPTIONS: ALL enemies lose #b1 buff at the start of combat (if the enemy has #yArtifact, it will lose that first).

shadowverse:TailRelic.NAME: Mask of the Great Fox
shadowverse:TailRelic.FLAVOR: We live within a strange story. Life is fleeting, mortals the flickering figures in a shadow play. To the end of the procession and beyond.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b1 #yOne-Tailed #yFox added to your draw pile. If you've played #b9 #yOne-Tailed #yFoxes this run, add #b1 #yGinsetsu, #yGreat #yFox to your deck instead.

shadowverse:InfernalCrown.NAME: Infernal Crown
shadowverse:InfernalCrown.FLAVOR: The dead are but empty vessels. Crude, earthen cups drained by the god of death. Pour, then! Fill the vessel and make it dance.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yReanimate #b3 on turn #b2, #yReanimate #b4 on turn #b3, and #yReanimate #b5 on turn #b4.

shadowverse:Alice.NAME: 'One-of-a-Kind Idol' Flair
shadowverse:Alice.FLAVOR: Alice Kurobane's concert is about to begin!
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a #yNecromancy effect is activated, deal #b3 damage to ALL enemies.

shadowverse:Offensive4.NAME: Token of 1st
shadowverse:Offensive4.FLAVOR: I go first, no need to redraw.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, if you are in #yVengeance, heal #b7 HP. Otherwise, heal #b4 HP.

shadowverse:IriaBOSS.NAME: Vermilion Bite
shadowverse:IriaBOSS.FLAVOR: Submit to the great power of the Vermilion Bite!
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose #b2 HP at the start of your turn. Heal #b4 HP at the end of your turn.

shadowverse:LustRelic.NAME: Embracing Wings
shadowverse:LustRelic.FLAVOR: Love and mix, ravish and enrapture. Let lust overtake you as you come together with your fellows.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #yDrain.

shadowverse:Lusia.NAME: 'Don't Waste My Time' Flair
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] when #yVengeance is activated.

shadowverse:Pendant.NAME: Urias's Pendant
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b1 Strength if Vengeance is active. If Wrath is active, gain #b7 Block. If Avarice is active, draw #b1 additional card.

shadowverse:BerserkRelic.NAME: Tetocalami, Berserker's Cudgel
shadowverse:BerserkRelic.FLAVOR: We’ll string you up, dress you, and devour you to the marrow!
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever Wrath becomes active, heal #b7 HP.

shadowverse:LonePromise.NAME: Lone Promise
shadowverse:LonePromise.FLAVOR: In lieu of a vampiric brand, he bestows upon her a crimson parting gift of another kind. The flower, and the lone screw, are a reminder of the glorious dance they shared.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your first #b2 turns, add #b1 #yRepair #yMode cards to your hand. At the start of your #b2nd turn, draw #b1 additional cards.

shadowverse:RevelrySeed.NAME: Seed of Revelry
DESCRIPTIONS: You and all enemies start combat with #b3 Strength.

shadowverse:Offensive5.NAME: Token of 1st
shadowverse:Offensive5.FLAVOR: I go first, no need to redraw.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, draw #b1 card(s) if the total number of cards in your deck is even. Otherwise, increase your Portal Points by #b1. NL Heal #b8 HP and gain #b8 Gold when your Portal Points reach #b8.

shadowverse:NemesisBOSS.NAME: Orchis's Cat Doll
shadowverse:NemesisBOSS.FLAVOR: Why do people love other people? Why do they hate them? I know that somewhere in the world the answer is waiting.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] whenever Resonance becomes active for you. Add 1 #yDazed to your discard pile when Resonance becomes inactive for you.

shadowverse:ArtsMaster.NAME: Haja Indira, Ultimate Way of the Fist
shadowverse:ArtsMaster.FLAVOR: I am, therefore the best of all possible worlds.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have any remaining Energy at the end of your turn, gain #b5 Block, draw #b2 additional cards next turn and deal #b5 damage to all enemies.

shadowverse:WhiteRelic.NAME: Destruction in White
shadowverse:WhiteRelic.FLAVOR: The urge to destroy is white. People's smiles on the morrow of the apocalypse will be evidence of the unstained righteousness of annihilation.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an Attack card is exhausted, apply #b1 #yWeak to a random enemy. If you also have the #yDestruction #yin #yBlack relic, add #b1 #yDestruction #yin #yWhite card to your hand at the start of combat.

shadowverse:BlackRelic.NAME: Destruction in Black
shadowverse:BlackRelic.FLAVOR: The urge to destroy is black. People's smiles on the eve of the apocalypse are the corrupt obstacle hindering the inevitability of annihilation.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an Attack card is exhausted, apply #b1 #yVulnerable to a random enemy. If you also have the #yDestruction #yin #yWhite relic, add #b1 #yDestruction #yin #yWhite card to your hand at the start of combat.

shadowverse:Knife.NAME: Zecilwenshe's Dagger
shadowverse:Knife.FLAVOR: I'll win in the end - I always do!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, gain #b1 Infestation Point. Whenever you take damage, lose #b1 Infestation Point. If you have less than #b3 Infestation Points, add 1 #yShiv to your hand at the beginning of combat. If you have #b3 or more Infestation Points, add 1 #yDiscovery instead. If you have #b6 or more Infestation Points, add 1 #yAbsolute #yTolerance instead.

shadowverse:TranquilCog.NAME: Tranquil Cog
shadowverse:TranquilCog.FLAVOR: Wisdom keeps the universe in motion.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your first #b3 turns, draw #b1 additional card if Resonance is active for you. Otherwise, draw #b2 additional cards.

shadowverse:Offensive6.NAME: Token of 1st
shadowverse:Offensive6.FLAVOR: I go first, no need to redraw.
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per combat: Right click to add #b1 #yEvolution #yPoint into your hand. Can be activated #b3 times per combat.

shadowverse:OliviasBlessing.NAME: Olivia's Blessing
shadowverse:OliviasBlessing.FLAVOR: A new world is our desire!
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st. Right click to add #b1 #yMiracle and #b1 #yEvolution #yPoint+ to your hand. Can be activated #b3 times per combat.

shadowverse:WindGodsBlessing.NAME: Fieran's Blessing
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, ALL #yFollowers gain + #b1 /+ #b1 if your Rally count is #b10 or more.

shadowverse:Conscription.NAME: Conscription
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you don't have any #yFollowers, summon 1 #yKnight.

shadowverse:Spineblade.NAME: Avaritia, Blade of Usurpation
shadowverse:Spineblade.FLAVOR: Go ahead, hunger. Once the craving overtakes you, claim what is rightfully yours. That is the true way of the world, after all.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, Scry 4.

shadowverse:KagemitsuSword.NAME: Enma Yasukuni
shadowverse:KagemitsuSword.FLAVOR: Thanks to you, I have drawn my blade from the scabbard called peace. I will cut down my enemies. That is the sole reason I exist.
DESCRIPTIONS: ALL cards that downgrade will automatically upgrade again after being played.

shadowverse:Durandal.NAME: Durandal the Incorruptible
shadowverse:Durandal.FLAVOR: A holy sword bound to a certain proud hero. Its blade will shine for eternity, never to break or tarnish.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain 2 #yBuffer.

shadowverse:Tree.NAME: Naterran Great Tree
shadowverse:Tree.FLAVOR: When the Mother begins to sing, all will be decided.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add 1 #yNaterran #yGreat #yTree to hand.

shadowverse:Offensive7.NAME: Token of 1st
shadowverse:Offensive7.FLAVOR: I go first, no need to redraw.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a #yCurse card, move it to your Amulet zone as a #yCountdown #b3 Amulet with #yBanish. If it's the first time this combat, draw #b1 card(s).

shadowverse:Savior.NAME: The Saviors, Spears of Repose
shadowverse:Savior.FLAVOR: Confront the mind in the depths of repose.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you do not play any Attack cards during your turn, start your next turn with #b4 Block.

shadowverse:GrandShield.NAME: Zeno, Paradoxical Shield
shadowverse:GrandShield.FLAVOR: Don't fill the world with any more false hope.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add #b1 #yHoly #yCavaliers to your hand.

shadowverse:GrandSword.NAME: Richard, Paradoxical Sword
shadowverse:GrandSword.FLAVOR: Hope that is given can only be false.
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per turn, gain #b2 Thorns whenever you gain Block.

shadowverse:BishopBOSS.NAME: Saren's Brilliant Feather
shadowverse:BishopBOSS.FLAVOR: When you spread your wings, your body will no longer be bound by gravity.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st. Gain 1 additional Amulet slot. If your HP is at or below 50%, start each of your turns with an additional [E].

shadowverse:HeresyAvatar.NAME: Heresy's Avatar
shadowverse:HeresyAvatar.FLAVOR: Utter its name and resolve yourself to madness.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a Curse card, apply #b1 #yArtifact. If the drawn Curse card is playable, change its cost to 0.

shadowverse:ErisRelic.NAME: Scepter of Atonement
shadowverse:ErisRelic.FLAVOR: So long as my companions watch over me, I will not err again.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an Amulet's Countdown reaches 0, gain #b2 #yTemporary #yHP.

shadowverse:IminaRelic.NAME: Totem of Madness
shadowverse:IminaRelic.FLAVOR: Speak your praise, mortal. For there is no god but me. —Inscription on a statue.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, give a random enemy #yTotem #yof #yMadness.

shadowverse:KyaruBOSS.NAME: Chaos Grimoire
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st. At the start of combat, reduce the max HP of all enemies by #b18% .

shadowverse:AnneBOSS.NAME: Anne's Spellbook
shadowverse:AnneBOSS.FLAVOR: O, spirit of war! Heed my call!
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st. All #ySkill cards you play count as #yMysteria cards.

shadowverse:KokkoroBOSS.NAME: Ameth Amulet
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st. Whenever you play a card, if it's the #b6th card played this turn, gain #b1 #yStrength and #yDexterity. NL Healing is #b50% more effective during combat.

shadowverse:MiyakoBOSS.NAME: Sweet Ghost Pudding
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st. 3 times per combat, at the start of your turn perform #yNecromancy 6: Add 1 #yApparition to hand.

shadowverse:IoBOSS.NAME: Glamour Whip
shadowverse:IoBOSS.FLAVOR: Yes! You called for your teacher~?
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st. Once per combat, when you deal #yFatal damage to an enemy, randomly upgrade a card in your deck.

shadowverse:RalmiaBOSS.NAME: Omega Drive
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st. Once per combat: When #yResonance becomes active, ALL Attack cards in your hand count as #yAF cards. When #yResonance is not active, ALL Attack cards in your hand count as #yMachina cards.

shadowverse:ShizuruBOSS.NAME: Sacred Blade
shadowverse:ShizuruBOSS.FLAVOR: Your big sister will always protect you!
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st. Once per combat: Right click to add #b1 #yEvolution #yPoint+ into your hand and gain 10 #yBlock. Can be activated #b2 times per combat. NL At the end of combat, restore #b3 health per activations left.

shadowverse:YukariBOSS.NAME: Eternal Mug
shadowverse:YukariBOSS.FLAVOR: Ehehe, I wanna go home early and have a drink~
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st. Whenever you heal HP, gain #bPower #bDamage #bImmune. NL Whenever you draw a #yStatus or #yCurse card, draw #b1 card.

shadowverse:ShinobuBOSS.NAME: Grim Soul Robe
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st. At start of your turn, perform #yNecromancy 4: Add 1 #ySkullfather to your hand.

shadowverse:BanShadowverse.NAME: The Weak Don't Deserve to Play Shadowverse
shadowverse:BanShadowverse.FLAVOR: The weak don't deserve to play Shadowverse.
DESCRIPTIONS: All Shadowverse cards cannot be played.

shadowverse:Enlightenment.NAME: Enlightenment, Sword of Creeds
shadowverse:Enlightenment.FLAVOR: Therefore stand by your own will—and I shall see the world put to trial.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain 1 Strength and Dexterity. If you have any copies of #yMjerrabaine in your deck, or have no duplicate cards in your deck, gain 3 Strength, 3 Dexterity and 1 Buffer instead.

shadowverse:Gliesaray.NAME: Gliesaray Orbs
shadowverse:Gliesaray.FLAVOR: When boys finally learn the bitterness inherent in yearning, that's when they ripen into men.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn #b5, draw #b5 extra cards and heal #b5 HP.

shadowverse:Juratio.NAME: Juratio, Blessed Signet
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, apply #b1 #yWeak and #yVulnerable to all enemies and gain #b2 #yRegen.

shadowverse:Lagedor.NAME: L'Age d'Or, Enchanted Wheel
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your first two turns, randomly add a #yLoot card to your hand. At the start of your 3rd turn, gain #b14 Block.

shadowverse:FortuneWell.NAME: Fortune Well
shadowverse:FortuneWell.FLAVOR: Why can't you make a different painting!?
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, choose and add 1 Rare card to your deck and obtain an additional card reward. After 8 combats and then every 6 combats afterward, choose and add 1 Rare card to your deck.
Choose a bonus card

shadowverse:MonikaBOSS.NAME: Flugel Coat
shadowverse:MonikaBOSS.FLAVOR: The coat worn by Monika, Cloudhall Admiral. Its luxurious tailoring inspires the minds and bodies of those who follow at its back.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yOf #y1st. Right click once per turn and up to #y2 times per combat to add 1 #yEvolution #yPoint to your hand. When you play an Evolution Point, all followers gain #g+1/+1.

shadowverse:Offensive8.NAME: Token of 1st
shadowverse:Offensive8.FLAVOR: I go first, no need to redraw.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b1 Overflow point.

shadowverse:TotalDomination.NAME: Total Domination
shadowverse:TotalDomination.FLAVOR: Everything turns to ash and dust with a slash of my claw. I guess if you wanted to be more than a dumb beast, you could swear fealty to me...
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of every turn. Start each combat with #b2 #yBurns in your draw pile and discard pile.

shadowverse:MaoAndFengtian.NAME: Mao and Fengtian
DESCRIPTIONS: The 2nd time you play an Attack card that was created each turn, draw #b2 cards and gain [E]

shadowverse:Hiro.NAME: 'Shadowverse is Life!' Flair
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, replace the #yDragon #yOracle in your deck with #yHiro #yRyuugasaki's #yDragon #yOracle

shadowverse:Enkia.NAME: Artiglio, Perforating Flame
DESCRIPTIONS: You are always treated as though you have played a #yCondemned card every turn.

shadowverse:DragonQueenCastle.NAME: Dragon Queen's Castle
DESCRIPTIONS: The first attack each turn that costs #b3 or more is played twice.

shadowverse:KayaBOSS.NAME: Dragon's Fist
shadowverse:KayaBOSS.FLAVOR: Kaya wore it on her hands like a glove, fitted with a huge dragon's wrist. It is said that it responds to the strong emotions of the wearer.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yOf #y1st. NL At the start of each combat gain #b3 #yOverflow points. Lose #b1 #yDexterity each turn.

shadowverse:GreaBOSS.NAME: Dragon Amulet
shadowverse:GreaBOSS.FLAVOR: A dragon talisman that enhances Grea's abilities. Under the protection of its gems, the Dragon Princess' flames become more intense.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yOf #y1st. NL Start each combat with #b1 Overflow point. At the start of each turn, if #yOverflow is active for you, add 1 #yGrea's #yEmber to your hand.

shadowverse:InoriBOSS.NAME: Inori's Piko Hammer
shadowverse:InoriBOSS.FLAVOR: Inori's favorite hammer. Completely modified after being transformed by the dragon Homare.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yOf #y1st. NL Start each combat with #b1 Overflow point. Start each combat with all enemies Stunned.

shadowverse:AlterplaneArbiter.NAME: Cross Craft
shadowverse:AlterplaneArbiter.FLAVOR: New Limited Time Format: Cross Craft! Build decks with cards from 2 different classes!
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemies will drop an additional card reward belonging to a Shadowverse class other than your own.
Enemies will drop an extra card reward (different from your Shadowverse class) from
#yRunecraft
#yForestcraft
#yShadowcraft
#yBloodcraft
#yPortalcraft
#ySwordcraft
#yHavencraft
#yDragoncraft
